title: 1.39 Solomon's Legacy
itunes:title: Solomon's Legacy
description: Solomon spends big time on his Temple and Palace. Hiram of Tyre bankrolls him. Solomon dies on the verge of a major rebellion led by his own slave-master, Jeroboam. I also discuss the two most important books attributed to Solomon: Proverbs, and the Song of Songs.
content:encoded: Solomon spends big time on his Temple and Palace. Hiram of Tyre bankrolls him. Solomon dies on the verge of a major rebellion led by his own slave-master, Jeroboam. I also discuss the two most important books attributed to Solomon: Proverbs, and the Song of Songs.
itunes:subtitle: Solomon bequeaths to his people a temple, a palace, and a rebelllion. And the books of Proverbs and the Song of Songs.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
